original_text: And when all our enemies heard of it, all the nations around us were afraid and fell greatly in their own esteem, for they perceived that this work had been accomplished with the help of our God.
korean_text: 우리의 모든 대적과 주위에 있는 이방 족속들이 이를 듣고 다 두려워하여 크게 낙담하였으니 그들이 우리 하나님께서 이 역사를 이루신 것을 앎이니라

sentences.original_text: And when all our enemies heard of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리 모든 원수들이 그것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: all the nations around us were afraid
and fell greatly in their own esteem
for they perceived that this work
had been accomplished with the help of our God
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 하나님의 도움으로 이루어졌음을 깨달았기 때문이었다
